Source code for hive.model.energy.energytype

from __future__ import annotations

from enum import Enum
from typing import Optional



[docs]class EnergyType(Enum):
    """
    a strict set of energy types recognized in HIVE
    """
    ELECTRIC = 0
    GASOLINE = 1


[docs]    @classmethod
    def from_string(cls, s: str) -> Optional[EnergyType]:
        values = {
            "electric": cls.ELECTRIC,
            "gasoline": cls.GASOLINE
        }
        if s in values.keys():
            return values[s]
        else:
            return None
